pr_title: Add a way to reload BlockMenu

timeline.message: Add a way to reload menus

timeline.bodyText: getSlots() seem rather un-intuitive. Think that name could be improved.
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

replies.bodyText: getWhitelistBlacklistSlots? It's always awkward to name
replies.author: WalshyDev

replies.bodyText: I know, but getSlots() is rather misleading. getNodeConfigArea() maybe?
replies.author: TheBusyBiscuit

timeline.bodyText: Can also just do updater#getVersion() instead all of this.
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

replies.bodyText: Doesn't that just return the entire thing... I want specifically the build number
replies.author: WalshyDev

replies.bodyText: No it returns the build number...
replies.author: TheBusyBiscuit

replies.bodyText:
My code is still better and returns int... just merge :^) <3
I want to sleep
replies.author: WalshyDev

replies.bodyText: Definitely not better, it's just redundant. Heck it doesn't even compile >.>
replies.author: TheBusyBiscuit

replies.bodyText: it does compile, it's stupid tests failing
replies.author: WalshyDev

replies.bodyText: Still, you should definitely fix this before it's gonna be merged...
replies.author: TheBusyBiscuit

timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

timeline.bodyText: ewwww, abusing try/catch for this is really unideal... We have a Pattern for Numerics you know?
